This is actually a long story, but here it goes:
I installed FCS some time ago with the included serial, everything went fine.
About a week ago I installed Shake 4.1, which required me to update Pro Application Support. After that compressor stopped working.
I deleted FCS and tried to reinstall it, but I always get "wrong serial" in the installer.  Anyone know how to work around this? Or if I can find a serial somewhere that works?
